title: Please help ... tired of this problem
body:
After I put my user name and password and press login waited for more than 30 minutes don't login without giving me any error message
This problem got more than two months on the  (EU Nordic & East) and missed my account and moved to ( EU West )
 4 days ago I got the same problem, tried all the solutions  : change dns, reinstall patch, turn of firewall and anti virus, make repair
all that not help me  stays in the login screen without any error

 {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Most issues with not being able to login are caused by either IE Security settings or network connectivity issues to the server. I strongly recommend working through our consolidated list of common solutions in our [login issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.

I've followed all the steps and tried to log in and succeeded
Shut down the game and tried again, but the problem came back again {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
Are there other solutions to try ?
Best regards

It sounds like there may be deeper issues that we need to look into. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attaching a set of [Hextech logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to expedite your service. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
